summary: Friends and family reflect on the life and death of 21-year-old Matthew Shepard, who was murdered in a targeted homophobic attack in Wyoming in 1998.
cast: Michele Josue|Judy Shepard|Zeina Barkawi|Dennis Shepard|Tim Galles|Walt Boulden|Nikki Pearson|Cynthia Whisenant|Julie Anderson|Rich Mack|Kate Chill|Gina Van Hoof|Romaine Patterson|Jason C. Marsden|Jim Osborn|Matt Galloway|Reggie Fluty|Dave O'Malley|Rob Debree|Rulon Stacey|Roger Schmit|Bill Clinton|Ellen DeGeneres|Russell Henderson|Kristen Johnston|Aaron McKinney|Barack Obama|Matthew Shepard
keywords: hate crime|f rated|hate crimes prevention act|state penitentiary|westboro baptist church
title: Matt Shepard Is a Friend of Mine
